entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as standing up and slamming the compartment door behind Malfoy. She also exchanges a nervous look with Harry.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is described as giving Harry a malicious look and departing. He is also mentioned as saying something that unnerves both Hermione and Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being unnerved by Malfoy's comment and exchanging nervous looks with Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as saying 'Chuck us another Frog' and clearly noticing nothing about the situation.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as being present with Harry, Luna, and Hermione.

entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is mentioned as being present with Harry, Neville, and Hermione.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as coming to the station with Harry, which seems reckless and dangerous in hindsight.

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as possibly being told by Mr. Malfoy about Sirius.

entities.name: mr. malfoy
entities.description: Mr. Malfoy is mentioned as possibly noticing the black dog and telling Draco.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: Crabbe is mentioned as lumbering in Malfoy's wake.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is mentioned as lumbering in Malfoy's wake.

relationships.description: Harry and Hermione exchange nervous looks after being unnerved by Malfoy's comment.
Malfoy gives Harry a malicious look before departing.
